Posts.Content: My insurance will not cover a out of network Dr,So my choices are to pay 100 % private or wait until oct and get a better plan Or find an in network Dr that has more experience.
Posts.Signature: Date of Diagonisis 10/11/2017 Age 50 PSA Level @ 4.57 A. Right Lobe - Infiltrative prostatic adenocarcinoma with the following features Gleason Grade 3+4 7 of 10 Grade Group 2 of 5 extensive tumor involvement in 5 of 6 core biopsies comprising about 60 % of tissue volume visulized,with greatest confluent tumor length of 1.1 cm extensive perineural invasion identified with s-100 immunohistochemical stains B. Left Lobe- Benign prostatic tissue
Posts.Title: Need advice

Posts.Content: I have decided to have the davinci surgery the only question was could i get a experienced surgeon , every where i read they say the surgeon is the key. I curently have kaiser permanente for my insurance and they declined a consultation with the surgoen that i choose because he is out of network. I just had a secound meeting with The current Dr and he has done approx 200 davinci surgerys total and states he is very comfortable and proficient with the machine. i can still have the guy that has done 1500 + prostate only surgerys i would just have to private pay or pay a substantial amount more. Anyone have experience going out of network with their insurance?
